conbody.p: The inventory report shall also include the following:
(a) Name and title of the individual(s) that performed the physical inventory;
(b) An itemized, categorized listing of all property capitalized:
(4) Special test equipment; agency peculiar property; and
(c) An itemized listing of the property lost, damaged, destroyed, or stolen, the circumstances surrounding each incident, and the resolution of the incident.
